verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> when <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>army,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> that were under his <S%H4475>dominion<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> were <S%H3898>fighting<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H5892>cities,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1980>'Go<s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him: <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am <S%H5414>giving<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he will <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

'And you will not <S%H4422>escape<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> for you will <S%H8610>surely<s%> be <S%H8610>captured<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you will <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> to <S%H5869>eye,<s%> and he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> with you <S%H6310>face<s%> to <S%H6310>face,<s%> and you will <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>' "'

<S%H389>"Yet<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah!<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you, 'You will not <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

'You will <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and as spices were <S%H4955>burned<s%> for your fathers, the <S%H1>former<s%> <S%H7223>kings<s%> <S%H4428>who<s%> were <S%H834>before<s%> you, <S%H6440>so<s%> they will <S%H3651>burn<s%> spices for you; and they will <S%H8313>lament<s%> for you, <S%H5594>"Alas,<s%> <S%H1945>lord!<s%>"' For I have <S%H113>spoken<s%> the <S%H1696>word,<s%> <S%H1697>"declares<s%> the <S%H5002>Lord.<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>

when the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> was <S%H3898>fighting<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3498>remaining<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> [that is], <S%H3923>Lachish<s%> and <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%> for they [alone] <S%H7604>remained<s%> as <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> among the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>release<s%> to them:

that <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> should <S%H7971>set<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H8198>servant,<s%> a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5680>man<s%> or a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5680>woman;<s%> so that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H1097>one<s%> should <S%H5647>keep<s%> them, a <S%H3064>Jew<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> in <S%H5647>bondage.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>officials<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> should <S%H7971>set<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H8198>servant,<s%> so that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H1097>one<s%> should <S%H5647>keep<s%> them <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> in <S%H5647>bondage;<s%> they <S%H8085>obeyed,<s%> and <S%H7971>set<s%> [them free.]

But <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>around<s%> and <S%H7725>took<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> and the <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H8198>servants,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they had <S%H7971>set<s%> <S%H2670>free,<s%> and <S%H3533>brought<s%> them into <S%H3533>subjection<s%> for <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H8198>servants.<s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> 'I <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with your forefathers in the <S%H1>day<s%> that I <S%H3117>brought<s%> them out of the <S%H3318>land<s%> of <S%H776>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H4714>house<s%> of <S%H1004>bondage,<s%> <S%H5650>saying,<s%>

"At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of you shall <S%H7971>set<s%> <S%H7971>free<s%> his <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has been <S%H4376>sold<s%> to you and has <S%H5647>served<s%> you <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> you shall <S%H7971>send<s%> him out <S%H2670>free<s%> from you; but your forefathers did not <S%H1>obey<s%> Me, or <S%H8085>incline<s%> their <S%H5186>ear<s%> to Me.

"Although <S%H3117>recently<s%> you [had] <S%H7725>turned<s%> and <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3477>what<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in My <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7121>proclaiming<s%> <S%H1865>release<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and you had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by My <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"Yet you <S%H7725>turned<s%> and <S%H2490>profaned<s%> My <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7725>took<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servant<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H8198>servant,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you had <S%H7971>set<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> according to their <S%H5315>desire,<s%> and you <S%H3533>brought<s%> them into <S%H3533>subjection<s%> to be your <S%H5650>male<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H8198>servants.<s%>"'

<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'You have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> Me in <S%H7121>proclaiming<s%> <S%H1865>release<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H7121>proclaiming<s%> a <S%H1865>release<s%> to you,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and to the <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you a <S%H2113>terror<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

'And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> who have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have not <S%H6965>fulfilled<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me, [when] they <S%H3772>cut<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> its <S%H1335>parts<s%> –

the <S%H8269>officials<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H8269>officials<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H5631>court<s%> <S%H5631>officers,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> who <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1335>parts<s%> of the <S%H5695>calf<s%> –

and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life.<s%> And their <S%H5038>dead<s%> <S%H5038>bodies<s%> shall be <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> and the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

'And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H8269>officials<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H340>enemies,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> which has <S%H5927>gone<s%> <S%H5927>away<s%> from you.

<S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H6680>command,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'and I will <S%H7725>bring<s%> them <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H5892>city;<s%> and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it and <S%H3920>take<s%> it and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>' "
